product_name: Hey HoneyOpen Your Eyes Eye Contour Lifting Fluid
summary: SummaryHey Honey Open Your Eyes Eye Lifting Eye Serum is a quickly absorbing, super light firming gel that wakes your eyes up by reducing puffiness, hydrating and tightening the skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsEliminates dark circles and under-eye bagsWakes up the eye area and reduces puffinessInstant gratification for tired eyesGreat for sensitive eyesMade with over 95% natural ingredientsClean beautyCruelty freeKey IngredientsSqualane helps to eliminate puffiness around the eyes and hydrates the delicate under-eye areaHoney has antioxidants which help to combat signs of aging around the eye areaGreen Tea is chock full of caffeine and antioxidants which help to boost circulation around the eye area, flushes out toxins and reduces the appearance of dark circles and puffinessFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesSLS and PhthalatesItem 2303373How To UseGently squeeze serum from the tube onto clean fingertip. Massage under and around the eyes (not onto eyelids) to reduce puffiness and restore radiance to the eye areaIngredientsAqua (Water), Cyclopentasiloxane, Squalane, Honey Extract, Glycerin, Isohexadecane, Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline, Isopropyl Myristate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Carthamus Tinctorius Oil, Malva sylvestris (Mallow) Flower Extract, Linoleic Acid, Sodium Acrylate/Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Polysorbate 80, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Butylene Glycol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Cetyl Phosphate, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Fructose, Glycine, Retinyl Palmitate, Niacinamide, Urea, Inositol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently squeeze serum from the tube onto clean fingertip. Massage under and around the eyes (not onto eyelids) to reduce puffiness and restore radiance to the eye area

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: Was expecting the metal tip application tip but it didnt come as advertised. Instead it was a regular squeeze tube.

reviews.headline: Now
reviews.comments: product not according to the description, purchase this product because it is good but also because of the applicator it has but when you receive it it is not the same

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This is the first eye lifting serum I have ever used, and I love it. I see a big difference when I smooth it on my under eyes within a minute I see a lot of smoothness of wrinkles under my eyes. Hope they never stop making this stuff.

reviews.headline: Moisturizing, that's it
reviews.comments: I love price of this eye serum, it's light and is absorbed quickly. There is no smell and it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. It's very hydrating which I appreciate but I feel most serums are, just wish it did a bit more for aging. Would purchase again.

reviews.headline: I love this product.
reviews.comments: I wash my face first.pat dry.Apply to my under eye area  in a circular motion until all cream is absorbed.I used it for 3 days and I can see how smooth my under eye area feels.

reviews.headline: works for me
reviews.comments: okay, this stuff is way better than I expected. I don't have heavy lines or super dark under eyes but it definitely brightens! I actually have to make sure I apply it evenly to each eye because i can literally see where my skin is lightened where I applied it. It also visably smooths and firms my under eyes. I'm very impressed! my one gripe is the entire tip broke off the tube so there's just a hole. I'm afraid it will dry out so I need to find a small container to put it in.

reviews.headline: Eye serum not in love
reviews.comments: I have to say I love the whole product line. The only item I'm not loving is the eye serum.  It doesn't smooth out it, does not plump up the under eye skin, it does not plump up fine lines, it doesn't moisturize. It just seems to absorb underneath the eye and then it goes back to feeling dry as it was before.  It's not a primer either.  Honestly if I put on any other primer or skin moisturizer would probably do the same job so I would say save your money

reviews.headline: Got off a subscription box - purchasing again
reviews.comments:
I LOVE this product. I got it off a subscription box a while ago and didn't know it was this expensive but I will buy again. I don't apply it to my under eye, but my upper eyelid to the brows. I'm not sure if this an incorrect way to use it but it works. I have mono eyelids and it helps pull my eyelids up all day for a nice fresh look all day!!! 

Seriously A MUST HAVE. It's so gentle on my eyelid and relaxing to tap on. I don't trust a lot of random products on my eyelids other than eyeshadow and eyeliner, but I'm so glad I used this cream serum product. It has literally changed the game for me.

reviews.headline: I don't see any results
reviews.comments: I don't know where the good reviews came from or why it is rated highly for effectiveness. I have been using it for weeks and it hasn't done a thing. I bought it specifically for the tightening. It doesn't tighten at the time of application or over time.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Hey Honey is new to me but I decided to give it a try. I love it! Really does what it's supposed to!

reviews.headline: Received this through ipsy and fell in love!
reviews.comments: absolutely love this! I noticed a difference in 2 weeks of brighter undereyes. I also noticed my crows feet werent near as noticable!

reviews.headline: Only thing that works for me
reviews.comments: I don't usually leave reviews but this is a lifesaver. I've tried all kinds of depuffers and yet this one of few that actually work. Effortless to layer under my routine. On my third container. About to buy my fourth

reviews.headline: My eyes thank you, Hey Honey!
reviews.comments: I never leave reviews, but read them often!  I tried this - and between late nights, early meetings and just running around all summer - this eye serum has made my bright and de-puffed!  LOVE LOVE LOVE this product.  Very light and feels cool on your skin... A+++++.  Need one for my desk, handbag AND anywhere I am running too.

reviews.headline: Won't be purchasing again
reviews.comments: I've been using this every morning after washing my face and before putting makeup on. The bottle it almost empty. I don't see a significant difference when I do use it so I will not be purchasing it again.

reviews.headline: Not good
reviews.comments: This used to work really well till they changed the formula. It still feels nice on the eyes and doesn't irritate but thats about all it does now. Not worth the price.

reviews.headline: Does not work
reviews.comments: I've used this every day for a week now and it does absolutely nothing to get rid of puffiness. A lot of money to spend for it to do nothing. Disappointing.

reviews.headline: Not Sure
reviews.comments: I am not sure about this product— it goes on smooth and leaves my under eye area really soft, but I do not notice any "tightening" as this product claims to do. It does leave my under eye area feeling moisturized, and it doesn't ball when other products are used over it, but I don't notice much difference of the eye puffiness or fine lines after applied. I will keep using it as a moisturizer, but I will not purchase again.

reviews.headline: It Works!
reviews.comments: I ordered this product hoping that it would diminish dark circles under my eyes. If it also tightened my skin, that would be a bonus. It does both!  I pat a very small amount around my eyes after moisturizer and before makeup.  It does a good job of getting rid of dark circles, and provides a temporary lift to loose skin. I will buy this again!

reviews.headline: This is some great stuff
reviews.comments: This is very effective - more so than the hundred or so others I have tried over the years.  It doesn't completely remove my (horrendous) bags and wrinkles, but it improves them visibly, and right away.  I use it twice a day and really like what I see in the mirror!

reviews.headline: Did nothing for me
reviews.comments: I bought this due to the outstanding reviews...but this did nothing for me...I saw no difference what so ever... To be Fair I'm giving it 3starz because perhaps I don't have the issues it helps with..I have some under eye hollowness and alil bit of dark circles...but I don't have any puffiness and not a lot of lines...I thought this would help give me more volume under my eyes and lighten up my slight darkness...but I don't think this helps what I have. Anyhey I will be returning.

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Doesnt leave skin greasy or sticky
Works GREAT as an eye primer

display_values: Doesnt leave skin greasy or sticky
Works GREAT as an eye primer

faceoff_positive.comments: I cannot tell you how excited i am to see Ulta carrying this terrific brand!   I received the Eye Fluid in a subscription box, and LOVED IT...been using it ever since.   It has a siilky, elegant formulation, goes on smoothly and absorbs with no residue--skin immediately looks rested, smoother & hydrated--i find that it replaces my eye primer even MORE effectively than my go-to.  Will NEVER be without it--thanks, ULTA, for staying on top of great new indie brands!
faceoff_positive.headline: Unbelievably silky, efficacious eye treatment!

faceoff_negative.comments: I am not sure about this product— it goes on smooth and leaves my under eye area really soft, but I do not notice any "tightening" as this product claims to do. It does leave my under eye area feeling moisturized, and it doesn't ball when other products are used over it, but I don't notice much difference of the eye puffiness or fine lines after applied. I will keep using it as a moisturizer, but I will not purchase again.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not Sure

rollup.name: Open Your Eyes Eye Contour Lifting Fluid
